data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Aspöck, Horst, Aspöck, Ulrike (2014): New species of the genus Nipponeurorthus Nakahara, 1958 (Neuroptera: Nevrorthidae) from China. Zootaxa 3838 (2): 224-232, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3838.2.7
